# UGP: Universal Gaussian Processes

[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/CollinErickson/UGP.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/CollinErickson/UGP)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/GauPro)](http://cran.r-project.org/package=GauPro)


This is an R package that provides a single interface for many different Gaussian process modeling software options.
